response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and benefits, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality asset at a discounted rate. We look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your goals and aspirations. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
